Netflix is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of award-winning TV shows, movies, anime, documentaries, and more on thousands of internet-connected devices.

넷플릭스 요금은 얼마인가요?: How much does Netflix cost?
스마트폰, 태블릿, 스마트 TV, 노트북, 스트리밍 디바이스 등 다양한: Watch Netflix on your smartphone, tablet, Smart TV, laptop, or streaming device, all for one fixed monthly fee. Plans range from KRW9,500 to KRW14,500 a month. No extra costs, no contracts.
어디에서 시청할 수 있나요?: Where can I watch?
다양한 디바이스에서 언제 어디서나 시청할 수 있습니다. 넷플릭스 계정으로:
Netflix is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of award-winning TV shows, movies, anime, documentaries, and more on thousands of internet-connected devices.

You can watch as much as you want, whenever you want without a single commercial – all for one low monthly price. There's always something new to discover and new TV shows and movies are added every week!
멤버십을 해지하려면 어떻게 하나요?: How do I cancel?
넷플릭스는 부담 없이 간편합니다. 성가신 계약도, 약정도 없으니까요. 멤: Netflix is flexible. There are no pesky contracts and no commitments. You can easily cancel your account online in two clicks. There are no cancellation fees – start or stop your account anytime.
